rightsInfo.usageTerms: the Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) 4.0 license applies to all NewsCodes

concept.name: minutes-played
minutes-played
concept.definition: Number of minutes this player has spent playing during a particular game.

concept.name: games-played
games-played
concept.definition: Number of games played.

concept.name: games-started
games-started
concept.definition: Number of games that started with this player on the court,.

concept.name: average-minutes-per-game
average-minutes-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of minutes per game played by this player.

concept.name: personal-fouls-per-game
personal-fouls-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of fouls made by the player per game.

concept.name: double-doubles
double-doubles
concept.definition: A double digit number in any two of these categories: points, rebounds, assists, steals, and blocked shots.

concept.name: triple-doubles
triple-doubles
concept.definition: A double digit number in any three of these categories: points, rebounds, assists, steals, and blocked shots.

concept.name: timeouts-left
timeouts-left
concept.definition: Number of timeouts a team has left during the current event.

concept.name: largest-lead
largest-lead
concept.definition: Largest number of points this team has led the opposition. Could be a negative number.

concept.name: fouls-total
fouls-total
concept.definition: Total number of fouls comitted by the team during this event.

concept.name: turnover-margin
turnover-margin
concept.definition: Turnover margain is the number of turnovers made by this team minus the number of turnovers made by the opposing team.

concept.name: field-goals-made
field-goals-made
concept.definition: Shots made that were worth two points each.

concept.name: field-goals-attempted
field-goals-attempted
concept.definition: Two-point shots that were attempted.

concept.name: field-goals-percentage
field-goals-percentage
concept.definition: Field goals made versus attempted. This could also be calculated from the above.

concept.name: field-goals-per-game
field-goals-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of field goals made per game.

concept.name: field-goals-attempted-per-game
field-goals-attempted-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of field goals attempted per game.

concept.name: field-goals-percentage-adjusted
field-goals-percentage-adjusted
concept.definition: A formula measuring shooting efficiency: [(points-scored-total - free-throws-made)/field-goals-attempted]/2.

concept.name: three-pointers-made
three-pointers-made
concept.definition: Shots made that were worth three points each.

concept.name: three-pointers-attempted
three-pointers-attempted
concept.definition: Three-point shots that were attempted.

concept.name: three-pointers-percentage
three-pointers-percentage
concept.definition: Three-pointers made versus attempted. This could be calculated.

concept.name: three-pointers-per-game
three-pointers-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of three-pointers made per game.

concept.name: three-pointers-attempted-per-game
three-pointers-attempted-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of three-pointers attempted per game.

concept.name: free-throws-made
free-throws-made
concept.definition: Shots made that were worth one point each.

concept.name: free-throws-attempted
free-throws-attempted
concept.definition: One-point shots that were attempted.

concept.name: free-throws-percentage
free-throws-percentage
concept.definition: Free throws made versus attempted.

concept.name: free-throws-per-game
free-throws-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of free throws made per game.

concept.name: free-throws-attempted-per-game
free-throws-attempted-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of free throws attempted per game.

concept.name: points-scored-total
points-scored-total
concept.definition: Total number of points scored, over.

concept.name: points-scored-per-game
points-scored-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of points scored in games played.

concept.name: points-scored-per-game-highest
points-scored-per-game-highest
concept.definition: Highest number of points scored in one game played.

concept.name: points-scored-per-shot
points-scored-per-shot
concept.definition: Calculated by dividing points-scored-total by field-goals-attempted.

concept.name: assists-total
assists-total
concept.definition: Total number of assists.

concept.name: assists-per-game
assists-per-game
concept.definition: Total number of assists per games played.

concept.name: turnovers-total
turnovers-total
concept.definition: Total number of turnovers.

concept.name: turnovers-per-game
turnovers-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of turnovers per game.

concept.name: team-turnovers-total
team-turnovers-total
concept.definition: Total number of team turnovers.

concept.name: team-turnovers-per-game
team-turnovers-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of team turnovers per game.

concept.name: points-scored-off-turnovers
points-scored-off-turnovers
concept.definition: Total number of points scored off turnovers.

concept.name: points-scored-in-paint
points-scored-in-paint
concept.definition: Total number of points scored from within the painted area surrounding the basket.

concept.name: points-scored-on-second-chance
points-scored-on-second-chance
concept.definition: Total number of points scored after fielding an offensive rebound.

concept.name: points-scored-on-fast-break
points-scored-on-fast-break
concept.definition: Total number of points scored off a fast break.

concept.name: rebounds-total
rebounds-total
concept.definition: The sum of all rebounds that were credited to particular players.

concept.name: rebounds-total-percentage
rebounds-total-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of rebounds total compared to total number of attempts.

concept.name: rebounds-defensive
rebounds-defensive
concept.definition: The sum of all defensive rebounds credited to particular players. A defensive rebound occurs when the team is in defence but gains possession through a rebound.

concept.name: rebounds-opponent-defensive
rebounds-opponent-defensive
concept.definition: The total defensive rebounds by the opposing team or player.

concept.name: rebounds-defensive-percentage
rebounds-defensive-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of defensive rebounds.

concept.name: rebounds-offensive
rebounds-offensive
concept.definition: The sum of all offensive rebounds credited to particular player. An offensive rebound is when the team keep possession of the ball through a rebound.

concept.name: rebounds-offensive-percentage
rebounds-offensive-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of offensive rebounds.

concept.name: rebounds-opponent-offensive
rebounds-opponent-offensive
concept.definition: The total offensive rebounds by the opposing team or player.

concept.name: team-rebounds-total
team-rebounds-total
concept.definition: The number of rebounds that did not credited to individual players, but were instead credited to the team as a whole.

concept.name: team-rebounds-total-percentage
team-rebounds-total-percentage
concept.definition: Percentage of team rebounds.

concept.name: team-rebounds-defensive
team-rebounds-defensive
concept.definition: The sum of all defensive rebounds credited to the team as a whole.

concept.name: team-rebounds-defensive-percentage
team-rebounds-defensive-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of defensive rebounds credited to the team.

concept.name: team-rebounds-offensive
team-rebounds-offensive
concept.definition: The sum of all offensive rebounds credited to the team as a whol.

concept.name: team-rebounds-offensive-percentage
team-rebounds-offensive-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of offensive rebounds credited to the team.

concept.name: team-rebounds-opponent-defensive
team-rebounds-opponent-defensive
concept.definition: The total defensive team rebounds by the opposing team or player.

concept.name: team-rebounds-opponent-offensive
team-rebounds-opponent-offensive
concept.definition: The total offensive team rebounds by the opposing team or player.

concept.name: rebounds-per-game
rebounds-per-game
concept.definition: The average number of personal rebounds per game.

concept.name: team-rebounds-per-game
team-rebounds-per-game
concept.definition: The average number of team rebounds per game.

concept.name: rebounds-offensive-per-game
rebounds-offensive-per-game
concept.definition: The average number of offensive personal rebounds per game.

concept.name: rebounds-defensive-per-game
rebounds-defensive-per-game
concept.definition: The average numer of defensive personal rebounds per game.

concept.name: rebounds-differential
rebounds-differential
concept.definition: The differential between the total number of rebounds from this team compared to the opposing team.

concept.name: rebounds-opponent-total
rebounds-opponent-total
concept.definition: The total number of rebounds (ofensive and defensive) by the opposing team or player.

concept.name: team-rebounds-opponent-total
team-rebounds-opponent-total
concept.definition: The total number of rebounds (ofensive and defensive) by the opponent which are credited to the team.

concept.name: steals-total
steals-total
concept.definition: Total number of steals.

concept.name: steals-per-game
steals-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of steals per game.

concept.name: steals-opponent
steals-opponent
concept.definition: Total number of steals-against by opponent.

concept.name: steals-differential
steals-differential
concept.definition: The number of steals made by this team compared to steals made by the other team.

concept.name: blocks-total
blocks-total
concept.definition: Total number of blocks.

concept.name: blocks-per-game
blocks-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of blocks per game.

concept.name: blocks-opponent
blocks-opponent
concept.definition: Total number of blocks-against by opponent.

concept.name: blocks-differential
blocks-differential
concept.definition: Total number of blocks made by this team compared to blocks made by the other team.

concept.name: points-scored-against-per-game
points-scored-against-per-game
concept.definition: Average of points scored against per game.

concept.name: points-scored-against-per-game-highest
points-scored-against-per-game-highest
concept.definition: Highest number of points scored against in one game played.

concept.name: field-goals-against-per-game
field-goals-against-per-game
concept.definition: The average number of field goals scored agains per game.

concept.name: field-goals-against-percentage
field-goals-against-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of field goals scored against.

concept.name: charges-taken
charges-taken
concept.definition: Total number of charges taken. A charge is when the referee toss the ball and one player of each team try to give their team possession of the ball.
